decoy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone or something that is used to trick someone into going somewhere or doing something, so that you can catch them, attack them etc
decoy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Officer Langley acted as a decoy to catch the rapist.
decoy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a model of a bird used to attract wild birds so that you can watch them or shoot them
